title: Why The Other Side Won't Listen to Reason
excerpt: At some point during your first year as a human being, the adults throw a real curveball at you. They expect you to start understanding what right and wrong mean. title: Why the French love to say no
excerpt: Although the default answer to almost every question, request or suggestion is a disheartening ‘non’, a ‘oui’ is often hiding in the context of what is being said.
